text: The murine macrophage cell line RAW 264.7 was purchased from ATCC ( Manassas , VA ) .

RAW 264.7 cells were maintained in RPMI supplemented with 5 % FBS and antibiotic-antimycotic ( 1000 U / ml penicillin , 1000 microg / ml streptomycin sulfate , and 250 ng / ml amphotericin B ) at 37degreesC .

Mouse embryonic fibroblasts ( MEFs ) cell line lacking specific NFkappaB signaling subunits NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - cell line ) [ 50 ] were cultured in DMEM medium supplemented with 10 % FBS and antibiotic-antimycotic solution .
